target: こんなふうに、楽な姿勢で座ってね

Break it, kids.
Hi everybody, I'm Phillip.
And I'm Lorena.
And welcome back to
Break It Kids.
Your move and break for your brain, body...

source: and senses!
Today, we get to build and take control of a giant mech.
target: みんな、今日はメカを作っていこう！

source: Now, for anybody who doesn't know, a mech is a robot we get to control from the inside.
target: めかっていうのは、なかから操縦することができるロボットのことだよ！

source: We get to choose what the robot looks like, we get to build it, and then go help a city.
target: どんなロボットにするか決めてからつくって、まちをたすけにいこう！

source: First, as always, we fire it up. Let's get robotic.
target: まずはきあいを入れてロボットを作るよ。

source: First and most important is the mech's head.
target: 最初に一番大切なメカの頭から！

source: This is where we'll be able to control all of the movement.
target: ここでメカのうごきをぜんぶあやつることができる。

source: Let's choose from a couple of different heads and then see which one works best.
target: じゃ、リストの中から選んで、どれがいちばんいいかためしてみようね。

source: To do that, we're going to scroll through the options by swiping our hand like this,
target: こんな風に、画面を手でスワイプしながら選んで

source: and then we're gonna try and fit the head on by doing twist jacks on the spot like this.
target: その場で腰をひねりながらジャンプをして試してみよう！

source: Time to focus it. Let's get our mech on.
target: みんな、集中して、メカに乗っていこう！

source: Now that the body's built, let's hop in and boot that mech up.
target: からだができあがったから、メカにのってうごかしてみよう！

source: Yes, we're ready to help the city. And there seems to be a lot going on. Remember, whatever we do, the mech will do. Let's go kids.
target: 町が僕たちの助けを呼んでいるみたいだ！ 僕たちがする動きはメカも同じようにしてくれることを忘れないで！みんな、行くよ！

source: Looks like there's a massive fire down at the harbour. Let's help out. To do that, we're going to lunge forward on one leg, arm straight out to spray the fire, and then we're going to repeat on the other side. Arm straight out and spray that water. Ready kids, let's go.
target: どうやら港で大きな火事が起こっているみたいだ。よし、助けるために、腕をまっすぐのばして、片足を前にだして水をかけていくよ。そして反対の足でもくり返そう。腕はまっすぐのばしたまま水をかけるよ。準備はいい？

source: We have to focus here. Arm straight out, spray the water.
target: 集中して！腕を伸ばして水をかけるよ！

source: Controlling a mech isn't easy.
Okay, other leg.
Down.
This is a massive fire and it's so hot. I'm glad we're in the mech suit.
target: ふぅ、あつすぎる。。メカに守られてて本当によかった。

source: Excellent. Right, focus kids. And forward.
target: とてもいい調子！反対がわ。

source: It's starting to go down a bit. We've got to keep going though.
target: だんだん火が小さくなってきたね！諦めないで！

source: That's it. Luckily we have these cool arms that can spray water.
target: 水をかけられるかっこいい腕を選んでよかったね！！

source: The balloons would have never worked.
target: ふうせんを選んでたら大変なところだったね！

source: See how much focus this takes? This isn't easy.
target: とても集中力が必要だね。大変だ！！

source: Here we go. It's almost out. Well done.
Come on kids.
Max focus. It's almost there.
target: みんな、ぜんしゅうちゅう！

source: One more on the other side.
Yes kids, well done. It's out.
Well done kids. The harbour's safe and now it's time to fly.
target: よくやったね！これでみなとは安全だ。次の場所に行こう！

source: The velociraptors loose in the city.
target: わあ、ヴェロキラプトルが街を走ってる！

source: How did this even happen?
Oh, there's a massive time portal open over there. That's probably how they got through.
target: そこにタイムトラベルできる穴がある！多分あそこから入ってきたんだね。

source: Let's round them up.

To do that, we're gonna use a force field generator. Standing feet, shoulders apart. Hand up like this. Move it across your body and lift your opposite knee up at the same time. And then repeat on the other side.
target: そのために、フォースフィールドジェネレーターを使うよ。あしは肩幅に開いて、手をこんな風に上げて。体の反対がわに動かしながら、手と反対がわのひざも同時に上げるんだ。そして反対側でもくり返すよ。

source: We're going to capture them and move them back into the portal. Ready kids? Let's go.
target: 捕まえてあの穴の中に戻すんだ。準備はいい？レッツゴー！

source: Okay, they're quick so we really have to focus here.
target: ヴェロキラプトルは素早いから集中していくよ。

source: Got him. Excellent. Okay, other side now. Balance as best you can. Remember, this is focusing. Body and brain working together.
target: 捕まえたね！！ みんな、すごい。今度ははんたいがわ！バランスをしっかりとって、頭と体を一緒に動かしていくよ

source: See, it's not easy, but we can do it. Other side.
target: 一緒にならできるよ！反対向き

source: Here we go. Balance.
Yes kids.
He thought he got away, but we got him. Let's keep going.
target: 大変だったけど捕まえたね。良くやった！

source: I mean, velociraptor's loose in the city. This is never a good sign.
target: 街にヴェロキラプトルがいるなんて！でも誰が

source: Who even opened that time portal?
target: タイムトラベルの穴を開けただろう？

source: Balance. A little bit wobbly that time. Here we go.
target: フラフラするけど、しっかりバランスを取って。

source: Okay, focusing kids. Other side.
That's almost all of them.
target: ほとんど全部捕まえたね

source: Okay, this one's the biggest one yet. We're really going to have to focus now.
target: わぁ、今まででいちばん大きいね。頑張って集中していこう！

source: As slow as you can.
Bring your knee up.
It's trying to get away.
And we got it.
That was a close one. Glad we're safe in the mech suit. Well done kids.
target: ふぅぅ、無事で良かった、 よくやったね！

source: Oh no, the bridge is broken and the train's on its way.
target: あっ、橋が壊れてるのに電車が来てる！

source: Let's do what we do best and help.
We're going to have to stretch across the gap so the train can go over us.
target: 電車が通れるように、隙間をうめよう。

source: To do that, you're going to go down to all fours like this and then stretch your opposite hand and opposite leg out.
target: そのために、こんな風によつんばいになって、手と反対がわの足をのばすんだよ。

source: And then repeat on the other side just like this.
target: そして、反対側でもこうやってくり返そう。

source: Ready kids? Let's go.
Okay, max focus.
This is going to be really tough. It's not an easy movement either.
target: とてもしんどくなりそうだね。簡単な動きじゃないよ。

source: Other side. Okay, here comes the train. Ready? Nice and straight.
target: 反対向き。電車が来るよ！いくよ、 せすじをまっすぐにね。

source: Stay as still as you can. Here we go. Stretch out.
target: できるだけじっとしていてね。いくよ。のばしていこう！

source: It's quite long, so this isn't easy. Here we go.
target: かなり長いから、しんどいけど頑張ろうね！

source: And other side. Luckily, the mech locks into position while we switch.
target: 反対向き。切り替える間メカはしっかり固定されるんだ。

source: There we go. Hold it there.
target: よし！このままキープしよう

source: Wow, it's a long, long train, but I can hear loads of people on it. Sometimes we're keeping them safe.
target: とっても長い電車だから、たくさんの人が乗ってるみたいだ。絶対に守らなきゃいけないね。

source: And switch again.
Wow, this mech suit is amazing. Imagine if we put the jelly legs on. It would never have worked. You guys helped build a perfect mech.
target: このメカスーツはすごいね。ゼリーの足をつけてたら、絶対うまくいかなかったよ。みんなのおかげで完璧なメカができたね。

source: Another super job, kids. What would the city do without us? Well done.
target: みんな、本当に良くやった！街を助けたね

source: Now it's time to power down
target: これからはリラックスする時間だよ

source: For our first cool it exercise, we're going to sit down, squeeze our legs, and then rock forwards and backwards, just like this.
target: 最初のクールダウンのエクササイズでは、座って足をぎゅっと閉じて、こんな風に前後にゆらゆら揺れよう。

source: All right, ready kids? Let's go. Squeeze your legs. That's it.
target: 準備はいい？足をぎゅっと閉じて。いいね。

source: And then rocking forwards and backwards.
target: 前後にゆらゆら、揺れるよ。

source: You can even close your eyes during this.
target: 目を閉じながらしても大丈夫だよ。

source: Nice and calming.
You can also focus on your breath
target: 前後にゆらゆら揺れながら

source: as you rock forwards
and backwards.
Just make sure you don't go too wild.
target: 倒れないように気をつけてね。

source: That's it, everyone.
Keep going.
Nice and slow, pushing off your feet.
target: ゆっくり足で押しながらね

source: One more here.
Excellent. Now this is a perfect tool to use when you're feeling worried or even frustrated. Great job, kids.
target: このエクササイズを、ストレスを感じたときやむねがいっぱいになったときにしてみてね。

source: For our final cool it exercise, we're going to do what's called a balloon breath. To do this, we're going to trace a balloon with our finger
target: 最後のクールダウンのエクササイズでは、バルーン呼吸をしていくよ。指で風船の形をかいてみよう。

source: and breathe in.
Then when we get to the bottom, hold your breath.
target: 下までいったら、息を止めて、

source: Then as we breathe out, trace the string.
target: 息を吐きながら、風船のひもを書いてみよう。

source: Okay, ready kids? Breathing in through your nose. Here we go. Trace that balloon
target: 準備はいい？鼻から息を吸って、風船を書いて

source: Hold your breath,
and breathe out. Trace the string.
target: 息をはいて、ひもをかくよ

source: That's it, let's do it again. Here we go.
Breathing in, allow your belly to expand.
target: 息を吸うとき、お腹をふくらませよう。

source: Hold your breath
and breathing out. Relax your belly.
target: お腹の力を抜いて、はこう。

source: That's it, let's keep going. Deep breath in
target: いいね。最後だよ。深呼吸して。

source: hold your breath.
and breathe it all out.
That feels amazing. I hope you feel as ready as I do for what's next.
target: すごいリラックスできたね！次のセッションが楽しみ！

source: We managed to build an awesome mech and save the city. We couldn't have done it without your help.
target: かっこいいメカを作って、街を助けることができたよ。みんな本当にすごかったよ！

source: Break it kids!
Hi everybody, I'm Philip.
And welcome back to...
Your movement break for your brain, body...
target: みんな、体とあたまを動かして

source: and senses...!
Yes, the sun's up. Let's have some fun on the beach, but first we fire it up. Let's get that body moving.
target: 太陽が出てきたね！！ビーチで遊ぶ前に、気合をいれるために体を動かそう！

source: I'm ready to go, yay!
Yay!
Wow, it's an absolute scorcher out today, and the sand is like lava. Gotta be quick to get to that shade. To do that, we're gonna hop across the sand like this,
target: わあ、今日はとっても暑いね！すなわまるでマグマみたい！急いで日かげに行かなきゃ！すなの上をジャンプして、

source: and then when we get to the shade, we're gonna cool our feet off
target: 日かげになったら、足を冷やそうね！

source: and make sure they don't catch fire.
target: 足のやけどに注意して

source: Ready? Let's go.
target: 準備はいい？レッツゴー！

source: All right, across that sand.
Wow, it's absolutely boiling.
Keep it up, we're almost to the shade.
target: 頑張って！もうすぐ日かげだよ！

source: Oh, and cool them off.
You gotta keep them moving quickly. We don't wanna see any sparks.
target: ひばなが出ないように、足を速く動かしてね！

source: Okay, who's ready for the next bit of shade?
target: よし、次の日かげに行くよ！準備はいい？

source: It's gonna be a long one, let's go. Across that sand, here we go. Keep it up, remember, on the spot.
target: 砂の上でジャンプ！できるだけ同じ場所をキープしながら頑張ろう！

source: Almost there, we're starting to burn.
target: もうすぐだよ、ちょっと熱くなってきた！

source: Oh, we're through the shade.
Oh, you gotta keep those feet moving quickly.
I feel so much better. I know this is tiring, but this is what Fire it up is all about. Ready? Last bit of shade. We're almost there.
target: 疲れるけど！これが気合を入れる時間だよ！最後の日かげだ！もう少し！

source: We can have a nice jump in the ocean. All the way.
target: 終わったら、海にジャンプしよう！

source: And fast speed on the last one.
Wow, we made it,
and by the looks of things, we still have our feet.
target: みんな、まだ足は無事だね！

source: Hee hee, I've still got mine.

We're definitely gonna need to have a cool off swim after all that hot sand. To do that, we're gonna stand side on and jump over the waves like this as they come. And then we're gonna switch and do the same thing on the other side. Ready? Let's go for that swim.
target: あつい砂の上にいた後は、冷たい海で泳がなきゃね！まず横向きになって、来る波をジャンプで飛び越えよう！そして、反対側も同じようにやるよ！準備はいい？泳ぎに行こう！

source: Here comes a big one.
All the way up!
Excellent, guys. You gotta keep both knees as high as you can.
target: いい調子だよ！両ひざをできるだけ高く上げよう！

source: Switch to the other side.
And over.
Nice.
It's not as easy as it looks, is it?
But we're almost there.
Gonna have the perfect swim after this. Switch to the other side.
target: このあとに泳げるなんて最高だね！反対向き！

source: Here we go. All the way up.
Wow, the ocean's so blue today.
target: なんて素敵なうみの色！

source: So inviting. We're so lucky we can be here to have the perfect swim.
target: この海で泳げるなんて、ほんとうに最高だね。

source: Core nice and tight. Switch.
Right over.
We're almost there.
The perfect dive.
And into the blue ocean we go.
I love a good swim.
target: やっぱり泳ぐのって最高！

source: There's so many beautiful fish swimming around. Let's see if we can get a closer look. To do that, we're gonna stand shoulders apart, hands in front of us, squat down and move the water around us just like this.
target: きれいな魚が、いーっぱい泳いでるね！もっと近くで見てみよう！足を肩幅に開いて、手は前に。しゃがんで、まわりの水をこんな風にかいで行くよ！

source: This is gonna be a tough one, so we gotta have strong legs.
target: 大変だけど、足の力を強くするチャンスだ！

source: Remember, this is fired up, so we don't give up.
target: 気合いを入れる時間だから諦めないで！

source: Okay, let's see what we can find.
Wow, look at that one.
It's got so many stings. That's a lionfish.
target: トゲがいっぱい、あれはミノカサゴだ！

source: And what else is there?
Look at the colors on that one. That's a parrotfish.
target: 見てあの色！あれはブダイだ！

source: Absolutely beautiful.
Here we go. Remember,
strong legs, strong core.
We keep it up.
Remember,
if your legs are burning,
you're doing it right.
Oh, nice playing legs. Octopus.
target: 見て！あしいっぱいのたこちゃんだ

source: We're at an amazing place.
target: とても素敵な場所だね。

source: There're so many fishes.
And last one.
Good thing we can hold our breaths for this one.
target: ふう、息が続いて良かった。

source: And got a view all these.
Yay.
Now it's time to focus it. Electrify that brain.
target: 頭のひらめき！スイッチ～、オン！

source: Purple squid is in the house.
target: むらさきイカが応援に来たよ！

source: All that swimming was so much fun. Now, let's paddle back to shore. To do that, we're going to lunge one foot forward and keep the other one behind. Hold on to your paddle. I'm going to row from side to side. Ready? Let's go.
target: 沢山泳いでとても楽しかったね。きしまではひざまずきながら、パドルを漕いで戻っていくよ。パドルを右、ひだり交互にこごう。準備はいい？行ってみよう！

source: All right, now we're in focus it.
So we've really got to balance on that front leg.
target: 前の足でしっかりバランスを取ってね！

source: And remember to keep your core tight because we don't want to fall into the water.
target: 水に落ちないように体幹にしっかり力を入れてね！！

source: We just did all that swimming. Now we want to paddle. We're also using two sides of that brain, so we've got to go from left to right each time.
target: たくさん泳いだ後は、今度はパドルを使うよ！左右の脳を使うために左から右に交互に漕ごう！

source: You guys are doing amazing. Each time in focus it,
target: みんな、すごい頑張ってるね！

source: we work so well as a team.
target: 素敵なチームプレイだね

source: Wow, we're really starting to catch the speed.
target: ドンドンスピードが出てきたね！！

source: Whoa, we're even riding a wave.
target: なみにも乗ってるよ！凄い！

source: Well done, guys. Keep up that paddling.
target: みんな、よく頑張ってるね

source: We're almost back to shore. You've got this, guys. From one side to the other.
target: もうすぐきしにつくよ！頑張って！ 左から右に交互に漕いで。

source: Two more!
And... Time!
Well done! We made it! back to shore safe and sound.
target: とうちゃく！無事にきしについて良かった！

source: Let's clean up this beach.
target: このビーチをきれいにするぞ！

source: Oh, no. There's so much plastic on the beach.
target: ペットボトルでビーチが汚れてる！

source: Let's do our bit and get cleaning.
Standing on one leg, we're going to reach with the opposite hand to pick up the trash and then switching sides to the other leg to pick up the next item.
target: じゃ、私みたいにカタ足でスクワットして反対の手でゴミを拾って、次は反対側の足を使ってゴミを拾うよ。

source: Here we go. Starting to balance on that leg, reaching for the trash every single time.
target: 片足でバランスをとりながら、一つずつゴミを拾っていくよ。

source: Now, this is quite tricky, so if you fall out of it, don't worry. Just get right back into it.
target: 難しいから、もしバランスを崩しても心配しないで。すぐにまた挑戦しよう！

source: Oh, my gosh. There's so many plastic bottles
target: ペットボトルがこんなに捨てられてるなんて、

source: and even a plastic bag.
target: おまけにプラスチックの袋も！

source: Now, remember, each time you see trash on the beach, we pick it up
target: ビーチでゴミを見つけたら、ひろって

source: and we throw it away.
Thank you, guys, so much for helping.
target: 手伝ってくれてありがとう！

source: Well done, everybody. Staying balanced on that leg.
target: 片足でバランスをとりながら頑張ったね！

source: This is focus set. So we're using that body and that brain all together.
target: 集中するために、体とあたまを一緒に使っていくよ！

source: You guys got it! Got less than ten seconds on the clock.
target: みんな、がんばって！！あと10秒だよ！

source: Gosh, there's even a shoe.
There's some strange things on the beach.
wow. A message in a bottle.
target: ビンの中にメッセージが入ってるよ！

source: Let's look inside!
Keep up the good work!
And the last one. Here it goes.
Yes. Well done, team. The beach looks so clean. Thank you.
target: よくやったね、みんな！ビーチがとてもきれいになったよ。ありがとう！

source: Purple squid says you rock.
After all that cleaning, let's have some fun. Time for beach bats. To do that, we're going to hold on to our bat, hit too high, and then squat down to hit too low. All right.
target: 掃除を頑張ったから、ビーチバットで楽しもう！！！！バットを使って高いところで二回うつ、次はひざを曲げて低いところで二回うつよ

source: Alright. Who's ready to become a beach bat boss? Here we go.
target: 準備はいいかな？行くよ！

source: Hitting 2 high and then 2 low.
target: 2回高いところ、そして二回低いところ！

source: Nice one, guys.
So we're focusing here.
We're trying to get every single ball.
target: ボールを落とさないようにしてね！

source: You guys are amazing.
Squatting down when we go low.
target: 低いところはひざを曲げて！

source: That's it. Opposite sides.
Whoops. We missed that one.
Good job, team. We're doing such a great job.
focusing here.
So we're going in all sorts of directions.
Also, hold on to that bat. We don't want it to fly away.
target: みんな、バットを落とさないように、しっかり持ってね！

source: That's it, guys. We're almost there.
target: いい調子だよ！あと少し！

source: Beach bada bada, beach bada bada... Almost the end!
target: ビーチ バダ バダビーチ バダ バダ頑張って！

source: And yes.
Well done, guys.
Incredible job, team. Now it's time to cool.
target: 良くやった！今はクールダウンの時間だよ

source: We're gonna take some deep breaths.
calm our heart and get ready for what's next.
Next up, we're going to sit crisscross like
put our hands together and squeeze them as hard as you can.
target: 手をギュッと合わせて、強く握ってみよう！

source: Relax
and go again.
Nice big squeeze.
target: 大きくギュッと握って

source: It feels so good to cool down.
target: クールダウンの時間はいいね！

source: Remember to sit as straight as you can
target: ねこぜにならないように

source: We don't want any floppy noodles.
Nice big squeeze...
and relax
Well done, kids.
Squeeze
and relax. Remember, you could use this any time
target: ゆるめて。ストレスを感じたときや、

source: when you're feeling stressed or a bit overwhelmed,
target: 胸がいっぱいになったときにしてみてね。

source: as we all do sometimes.
Big squeeze.
And the best part
You don't need a lot of space, so you can do it anywhere.
target: 狭くてもできるからいつでもできるね

source: And relax...
Ahh, much better!
I'm super chilled.
For the last exercise, we're going to do a figure of eight breathing. So imagine you have a big figure of eight in front of you, and we're going to start in the middle,
target: 最後のエクササイズは、８の字呼吸をやるよ！目の前に大きな８の字を描いてね、真ん中から始めよう！

source: breathe in on the one side,
and as we get to the middle,
breathe out on the other side.
Okay,
three, two, one.
Remember, everyone does this at a different pace,
target: みんなペースが違うから、

source: so it's okay to keep your own.
Boy, that feels good.
definitely requires a little bit of concentrating.
target: みんな集中して頑張ろう。

source: Everyone did such a great job during this adventure. Take some time to soak it in.
target: みんな今回の冒険もすごく頑張ったね！ゆっくり休んでね！

source: See you soon, kids.
Thanks for joining us! See you next time!
target: 参加してくれてありがとう！またね！！！

source: Break it Kids!
